name: Stuck in a Tutorial
description:
Stuck in a Tutorial is a Game made for the Ludum Dare 47 Compo where you are stuck in a loop of the game reloading the tutorial instead of loading the main game.

NOTE: The Linux and Mac versions have not been tested to work yet
2ND NOTE: I did fix an issue where webgl didn’t work during the submission hour, but the rules state that “certain bug fixes” are allowed after the deadline
